actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the tax treatment of discharges of indebtedness under certain student loans.
short_title: Higher Education Tax Equity Act of 1989

summary.text: Higher Education Tax Equity Act of 1989 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code with respect to the tax exclusion for discharges of indebtedness under certain student loans made by a State with no accredited professional law or medical schools.

titles.title: Higher Education Tax Equity Act of 1989
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the tax treatment of discharges of indebtedness under certain student loans.
